title: Oil Holds Biggest Drop Since June as Iran Concerns Subside
description: Oil steadied after its biggest decline since June as the US indicated it would hold off on attacking Iran for now.
content: Oil steadied after its biggest decline since June as the US indicated it would hold off on attacking Iran for now.
